CHAT.comment: LARRY BEGAY, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARGARET A. KATZE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LEONDRA R. KRUGER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 12:04 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
